item.title: The Most Commonly Misspelled Italian Dessert: Can You Spell 'Cannoli'?
item.description: Introduction to Cannoli Cannoli is a delicious Italian dessert that has been enjoyed for centuries. But even though it’s a popular treat, it’s often mispronounced and misspelled. In this blog post, we’ll explore the history of cannoli, the common misspellings, and tips for avoiding mistakes. Definition of Cannoli Cannoli is a traditional Italian pastry that is filled with a sweet, creamy filling. The dough is made from flour, sugar, butter, and eggs, and is then rolled and deep-fried.
